title: 2019/20 Top 5 European Leagues Analysis
description: Analysis on Top 5 European Leagues(PL,Bundesliga,La Liga,Serie A,Ligue 1)
contents:
Overview:
Top 5 European Leagues majorly involve leagues played in Italy,England,France,Germany and Spain.
An interactive dashboard is being implemented to display all the related statistics for respective players and leagues.This project is mainly contains lot of visualizations and we interpret results from it.
Data:
FIFA Ratings data from https://sofifa.com/ is used for exploratory data analysis to display radar charts,bar charts.
FBREF-https://fbref.com/en/ is used for ranking of players based on certain criteria and attributes.
For Transfer data is scraped from https://www.transfermarkt.co.in/
Description:
Home Page
League Stats
Player Comparison
Loan Analysis
Ranking
League Stats- Visualizations of world map,bar charts and certain key metric calculations are displayed
Player Comparison- Radar Charts are displayed based on official FIFA card rating
Loan Analysis- Profit and Loss Ratio of teams with respect to Transfer Markt
Ranking- A mathematical approach is implemented for ranking
AHP(Analytic Hierarchy Process) is used for calculating weights for the attributes
Technique for Order of Preference by Similarity to Ideal Solution (TOPSIS) is used to calculate ranks
Project Details can be found via this link
Project Link-Only Visualizations Included- link

title: Kabaddi Player Comparison
description: Comparing Kabaddi Players of different teams and tournaments based on important metrics
contents:
What it is
Kabaddi Player Comparison is an application in which all the players can be compared based on several metrics with respect to different tournaments and teams.
In this project, we majorly analyze pro kabaddi league and derive different player metrics
For Raiders Raid Points,Effective Points, Bonus Points etc is displayed
For Defenders Tackle Points,Number of Tackles are is displayed
Tools Used-R Shiny, R, MySQL
Link for the APP
